seo.title: Contact Us | LiveSocceRR
seo.description: Contact LiveSocceRR for support, bug reports, partnerships, and feedback. Email us at service@livesoccerr.com.
seo.ogDescription: Support, partnerships, and feedback — reach LiveSocceRR at service@livesoccerr.com.

intro: To make sure your query or feedback gets to the right person, please contact us via email.
We review every message and will get back to you if we need more information. For most requests, email is the fastest option.

sections.title: What you can contact us about

items: Technical support (site not loading, wrong scores, broken pages)
Bug reports (screenshots and steps to reproduce help a lot)

blocks.text: If you are reporting a problem, please include:

items: The exact URL of the page (copy/paste is best)
Your device and browser (e.g., Android Chrome, iPhone Safari, Windows Chrome)
A short description of what you expected vs what happened
Screenshots or screen recordings, if possible
The time the issue occurred (with your timezone)

blocks.text: We try to respond as quickly as possible. Response times can vary depending on the request volume and the complexity of the issue. If you haven't heard back within a reasonable period, feel free to follow up with the same email thread.
Email us at service@livesoccerr.com. This is the primary support channel.

content.note: We will use only email for contacting.
